Colophon

This site is a digital garden of ideas, projects, and photographs. Here's how it's made.

Typography

IBM Plex Mono for headings and interface elements

Gelasio for body text

Currently served via Google Fonts. Self-hosting planned for improved privacy.

Technology

Built with Quarto

Hosted on Cloudflare Pages

Contact form powered by FormSubmit

Privacy

This site uses no analytics, tracking, or cookies beyond what Google Fonts requires (temporary). Contact form messages are sent directly to my email via FormSubmit and not stored elsewhere.

Design

Inspired by editorial layouts, vintage postcards, and clean magazine design. Built with an emphasis on readability, minimal distractions, and personal expression.

Last updated: November 2025
